text: Varsha Bhosle (1956 â€“ 8 October 2012) was an Indian singer, columnist and writer based in Mumbai. She was the daughter of the playback singer Asha Bhosle. On 8 October 2012, Bhosle did suicide at her home in Mumbai. Mumbai Police said she has shot herself with a licensed gun.Archive of Varsha Bhosle's articles on Rediff Retrieved 5 February 2012. == References == Category:1956 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Indian singers Category:Indian writers Category:People from Mumbai
title: Varsha Bhosle
